definition: Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat
(Internet slang) time after time/again and again and again
darlings/fans/followers/short form of 親愛的們|亲爱的们
to return to the topic (idiom)/to get back to the main point
(final particle similar to 了[le5], indicating that sth is obvious)
(Internet slang for 然而[ran2 er2]) however
Oh! (exclamation of dismay etc)/see 呦呦[you1 you1]
